guide.introduction: Part of the Global Village Construction Set, the CEB Press makes bricks out of soil. This guide shows how to build the frame.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Part of the Global Village Construction Set, the CEB Press makes bricks out of soil. This guide shows how to build the frame.

Tools
  • 1/2" Allen Wrench
  • Hole punch
  • Mag Drill
  • torch

lines.text: Punch the holes in the horizontal members (B) and in the drawer members (C)
lines.text_raw: Punch the holes in the horizontal members (B) and in the drawer members (C)

lines.text: In the horizontal members, the holes should be 7/8” in from the long side, and as close as you can get them to the wall of the U-channel. There are 4 holes in each piece.
lines.text_raw: In the horizontal members, the holes should be 7/8” in from the long side, and as close as you can get them to the wall of the U-channel. There are 4 holes in each piece.

lines.text: In the drawer members, the holes should be 4 7/8” in from the long side, and as close as you can get them to the wall of the U-Channel. There are 4 holes in each piece.
lines.text_raw: In the drawer members, the holes should be 4 7/8” in from the long side, and as close as you can get them to the wall of the U-Channel. There are 4 holes in each piece.

guide.summary: This guide shows how to fabricate and assemble the frame of the CEB (Compressed Earth Brick) Press. It is made of angle steel and a hydraulic cylinder.
guide.title: CEB Press Frame (including Main cylinder)
